name: Kobold, Empyrean
description: The Kobold Empyrean is a small celestial being that blends celestial and draconic powers, serving as a source of strength and inspiration for other kobolds, adorned with robust armor and possessing formidable abilities.
memorable: Its ability to reincarnate fallen kobolds as wyrmling dragons dramatically shifts the tides of battle.
goals: To inspire and support its fellow kobolds and excel in combat.
relations: Often accompanies other kobolds, enhancing their capabilities and coordinating their efforts.
environment: Prefers environments where kobolds thrive, often found among their kin.
strengths: Immunities to radiant damage and various resistances make it extremely resilient against many forms of attack.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on allies for support, making it vulnerable when isolated.
attacks: Can deliver three magical claw attacks, each dealing slashing damage augmented by elemental damage of its choice.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to invoke elemental damage in a 60-foot cone, dealing significant area damage while coordinating ally attacks.
senses: Has a passive perception of 19, showcasing excellent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Boasts a perception skill modifier of +5, indicating a good ability to notice details.
additional_information: Aura of Draconic Virtue grants advantage to allies within range.
Invisibility allows for stealth in combat situations.
Immortal Nature means it doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells.
Massive elemental damage potential with Invoke the Dragon Gods.
test_queries: inspiring draconic creature with powerful abilities
kobold leader that can turn allies into dragons
elemental damage dealer in a 60-foot cone
celestial monster with magical attacks and invisibility
